com.faltro.houdoku.util

Interface ContentSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericContentSource, MangaDex, MangaHere, MangaSee, MangaTown

    public interface ContentSource

      • search

        java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> search(java.lang.String query)
                                                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                 NotImplementedException
        Searches the source using a provided query.

        This method does NOT load Series objects, since the amount of series information provided by the search page is often limited. Instead, the following data about each result is retrieved: - contentSourceId (int) - the ContentSource's ID field - source (String) - the URL to the series page - coverSrc (optional) (String) - a URL to an image of the series' cover - title (String) - the title of the series - details (String) - a generally multiline string which contains the information about the series that will appear in the client's table of search results

        Parameters:
        query - the text to search for
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of HashMap's where keys are the field names listed above as Strings and values of the matching type
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - an IOException occurred when searching
        NotImplementedException - the operation has not yet been implemented for this content source

      • chapters

        java.util.ArrayList<Chapter> chapters(Series series)
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      NotImplementedException
        Parse all of the chapters of the given series.

        This method may choose to call chapters(Series series, Document document) if the list of chapters includes a pager that can only be navigated by loading multiple documents.

        Parameters:
        series - the series that the chapters are from
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Chapter's using data from the provided document
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - an IOException occurred when loading the series page
        NotImplementedException - the operation has not yet been implemented for this content source

      • chapters

        java.util.ArrayList<Chapter> chapters(Series series,
                                      org.jsoup.nodes.Document document)
                               throws NotImplementedException
        Parse all of the chapters on the given Document.

        This method is NOT guaranteed to return all chapters of a given series -- use chapters(Series series) for that.

        Parameters:
        series - the series that the chapters are from
        document - the document to find chapters on
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Chapter's using data from the provided document
        Throws:
        NotImplementedException - the operation has not yet been implemented for this content source

      • series

        Series series(java.lang.String source)
       throws java.io.IOException,
              NotImplementedException
        Parses the given source as a Series.

        The given source is generally a URL fragment relative to the domain, but this is not explicitly required. The fragment also generally contains a preceding forward slash, but including one is not explicitly required and may depend the source URL's retrieved from search results.

        Parameters:
        source - the source of the series page
        Returns:
        a Series using the data on the series page
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - an IOException occurred when loading the series page
        NotImplementedException - the operation has not yet been implemented for this content source

      • cover

        javafx.scene.image.Image cover(java.lang.String source)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               NotImplementedException
        Retrieves a series' cover image from the given URL.

        This method does not always need to be implemented. It is primarily used when the ContentSource's search results page does not present series covers.

        This method generally goes to the given source, which is probably a series page, and finds the cover image on that page.

        Parameters:
        source - the source of the page which contains the cover image
        Returns:
        the cover Image for the series at the given source page
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - an IOException occurred when loading the image
        NotImplementedException - the operation has not yet been implemented for this content source
        See Also:
        imageFromURL(String)

      • image

        javafx.scene.image.Image image(Chapter chapter,
                               int page)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               ContentUnavailableException,
                               NotImplementedException
        Retrieves an Image of a chapter page.

        This method generally uses the source property of the given Chapter (via chapter.getSource()), which is almost certainly a "reader" page, where specific pages can often be loaded by appending a page number to the URL in some fashion.

        This method almost certainly has to make two requests: one to load the proper page of the reader, and another to load the direct image URL by processing the reader page's contents.

        When this method is called, chapter.images may not be initialized, since sources almost never provide the number of pages in a chapter before going to the reader itself (which is only loaded by this method). Thus, this method should check whether chapter.images is initialized and, if it is not, this method should determine the number of pages in the chapter and initialize chapter.images with the appropriate size.

        Parameters:
        chapter - the chapter that contains the desired image
        page - the page number to retrieve, starting at 1
        Returns:
        the Image of the requested page of the given chapter
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - an IOException occurred when loading the image
        ContentUnavailableException - the retrieval of the image was blocked by the ContentSource's website itself
        NotImplementedException - the operation has not yet been implemented for this content source
        See Also:
        imageFromURL(String)

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Represents this ContentSource as a string.k
